China: Huizong's son Emperor Chongzong of Western Xia became emperor of Western Xia.
England: Work commenced on the Domesday Book.
Spain: Alfonso the Brave installed his vassal, an al-Qádir, as king of Valencia.

Battle of Sagrajas: Yusuf ibn Tashfin, the sultan of the Almoravid dynasty, at the head of a coalition of Andalusian taifas, defeated León and Castile and Aragon in a bloody battle near Badajoz. The taifas renounced payment of the parias.
